name: Hardly Hungry Harry
description: Hardly Hungry Harry was made in a few days in celebration for 2k subscribers on the BenBonk YouTube channel. In Hardly Hungry Harry you play as a watermelon sandwich trying to fling itself into Harry’s mouth to progress to the next level. Be careful though as you don't wan't to drink milk and turn into a disgusting meat sandwich! Just a note, if you are playing on a device with a 16x9 aspect ratio, hit the blue full screen button. If you are on a device without a 16x9 aspect ratio, like most MacBooks, hit the transparent gray full screen button. Playing in some sort of fullscreen is highly reccomended.
